title: (08328) Alella - 6 Avinguda Sant Josep de Calassanç
title_short: (08328) Alella - 6 Avinguda Sant Josep de Calassanç
description: Beautiful little bivouac, near Barcelona, with a small natural park in the forest. A paradise for walks, trail, mountain bike. Certainly tricky to park there in high season

title: (08328) Alella - 29 Avinguda Ferran Fabra
description: I went to the other parking lot that was marked in the application and it was full, It is true that from September 3 to 8 are the holidays here. Testing streets I got to this parking lot, there was 1 motorhome and 3 vans. Super quiet and the neighbors said very safe. I caught the town festivals and there was a lot of atmosphere in the square but 0 discomfort to sleep. No overnight prohibition sign.

title: (08328) Alella - 44 Carrer de la Riera Principal
title_short: (08328) Alella - 44 Carrer de la Riera Principal
description: Source of drinking water with a new tap. Under the plane tree, across from the skate park.

title: (08328) Alella - Ctra Masnou Granollers
description: Self-wash for large vehicles, accepts coins of 0.50, 1 and 2 euros, exchange machine for 5 or 10 euro bits.

name: CanVan
title: (08329) CanVan
description: Temporarily closed. CanVan, private property where a family with two small children lives. Nice and cozy place with chickens, games for children and a vegetable garden. Contact and reservation required. There are no services. Direct bus to Barcelona 2 minutes from the house at about €3 each way.

title: (08329) Teià - 40 Avinguda J Roca Suarez L
title_short: (08329) Teià - 40 Avinguda J Roca Suarez L
description: Large car park day and night near a library at the entrance to the city. (Prohibition sign for vehicles over 3.5 tonnes) We slept quietly there (5 campers)

title: (08329) Teià - 2 Camí del Cementiri
description: Parking to park and spend the night, with views.

title: (08320) El Masnou - 574 Carrer Amadeu I
description: Good location for an overnight stay. Its not beautiful but you have several shops and restaurants near by.

title: (08320) El Masnou - 7 Carrer Amadeu I
description: Parking without services, many vehicles, pizzeria nearby. It's not bad to spend a night at 300m from the beach.

name: Camping
title: (08188) Camping
description: Camping "El Vedado" in greenery with a bus that takes you to Barcelona and return simple and fast.

name: Càmping Masnou
title: (08320) Càmping Masnou
description: Good for its proximity to Barcelona.The train station (trains to Barcelona run regularly - ATTENTION 2 ZONES buy a ticket) and the beach are a short walk away. Sanitary facilities are getting old but always clean and there is always enough paper available. Good compromise to visit the city and leave the vehicle safely.

title: (08320) El Masnou - 30 Carrer Parlament de Catalunya
title_short: (08320) El Masnou - 30 Carrer Parlament de Catalunya
description: Free parking spot 10min walk from the beach. Next to a kids music school so area was very busy early in the evening but no one seemed to mind that we parked there, cooked dinner etc. We didn’t stay overnight but I’m sure it wouldn’t be a problem either. Very safe area. If you walk down to the beach you can take a shower there.

title: (08329) Teià - Autopista del Maresme
description: Rest area without service

title: (08320) El Masnou - 18 Carrer Agricultura
description: Large car park with no height limit. We slept there for 1 night. Route N11 nearby but not too busy at night.

title: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 13 Carretera a Premià de Mar
title_short: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 13 Carretera a Premià de Mar
description: Quiet dirt parking to park and spend the night.

title: (08390) Montgat - 17a Avinguda Can Serra
description: Two drinkable water taps at the local sports playground in Montgat

title: (08320) Barcelona - 13D Carrer Sector Voramar
description:
Quiet zone near the sea, from 10 o'clock in the morning you have to pay for the blue zone every day between June and September. It is not a charming place but if you are there you can spend the night.
01.06-30.09 limited stay 1 day

title: (08390) Montgat - 11B Avinguda de les Vilares
description: Neighborhood parking spot, very calm, with some trees

title: (08330) Premià de Mar - 13 Carrer Torrent Malet
title_short: (08330) Premià de Mar - 13 Carrer Torrent Malet
description: Secure parking, near the police station, near the train station and pedestrian crossing and bike in Barcelona, without services. Next door is a restaurant and a 24h service station.

title: (08390) Montgat - Av. Unió, 60
description: Large sand parking without services very quiet at night and a little busier during the day along areas of municipal sports equipment, institute, library, soccer field and cemetery enjoys privileged views of the coast of Barcelona

title: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 138 Carretera dels Sis Pobles
title_short: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 138 Carretera dels Sis Pobles
description: Municipal stadium parking lot. Very large. Relatively quiet.

title: (08330) Premià de Mar - 5 Carrer Torrent Malet
title_short: (08330) Premià de Mar - 5 Carrer Torrent Malet
description: Parking, near the city. Only 5 minuts walk to the city center and near the beach.

title: (08338) Premià de Dalt - Carretera dels Sis Pobles
title_short: (08338) Premià de Dalt - Carretera dels Sis Pobles
description: Parking of Bikepark la Poma. The bikepark has a fountain and toilets.Interesting only if you come to ride the bikepark.

title: (08330) Premià de Mar - Carrer d'Enric Borràs, 40
title_short: (08330) Premià de Mar - Carrer d'Enric Borràs, 40
description: Big parking lot on mixed ground, gravel and concrete. Free all the time. There are some trees you can park under for shade. Its a close walk to the beach. No amenities except for the place to stay. Good location for bigger trucks too.

title: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 11 Carrer Margarita de Sucre
title_short: (08338) Premià de Dalt - 11 Carrer Margarita de Sucre
description:
Parking lot. Dirty but in front of houses. 
High restricted to 2.5m.

title: (08390) Montgat - 51 Carrer Riera de Sant Jordi
title_short: (08390) Montgat - 51 Carrer Riera de Sant Jordi
description: Fountain with a lot of pressure at the end of a dead end street where you can fill discreetly and without haste

title: (08339) Òrrius - Vilassar de Dalt
description: Car park in Can Boquet park. I stayed in low season and it was very quiet.

title: (08911) Badalona - 101 Carrer d'Occitània
description: Free parking near the beach next to a small park with water and something shady with trees and near bp gas station and near restaurants.

title: (08338) Premià de Dalt - Unnamed Road
description: Not bad

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 12 Carrer Ignasi de Bufalà
title_short: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 12 Carrer Ignasi de Bufalà
description: Public parking with a pine forest, quiet, with shadows, with public transport, a pizzeria nearby, a "rostisseria" (there are cheap chicken menus at the ast) ... we spent one night it was the festivities of the village at the end of August ... we ran away from the noise of the beach, train and cars, here we slept very well ... recommended the place and the city at parties ...

title: (08911) Badalona - 38 Carretera de Mataró
description: Here you can stay a free night near Barcelona in autumn / winter even free! It is right on the sea unfortunately also on the rail! Drinking water is also available

title: (08916) Badalona - 21 Carretera de Can Ruti
description: Family park with possibility of doing a barbecue, free parking open from 7am to 20:30, very quiet nature

title: (08911) Badalona - 36 Carrer Marina
description: Possibility of loading water

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 25 Carrer Rafel Riera i Prats
title_short: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - 25 Carrer Rafel Riera i Prats
description: Laundry room to wash clothes. Various capacities with drying option.

title: (08339) Vilassar de Dalt - Unnamed Road
description: Old shooting range. No access without 4x4. No chance to get out in rainy weather. Very remote.

title: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 5 Avinguda de l'Onze de Setembre
title_short: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 5 Avinguda de l'Onze de Setembre
description: LAVARAPID Open 365 days a year from 8am. at 10 p.m. 18 kg washing machines. Automatic payment machine. Accepts bills and coins

title: (08330) Premià de Mar - s/n Camí Ral
title_short: (08330) Premià de Mar - s/n Camí Ral
description: Laundrette with large & medium size machines. All were available when I went. Also an ALDI and restaurants nearby, only suitable to access with van not caravan

title: (08915) Badalona - 1 Carrer de l'Energia
description: Quiet place to spend the night. Supermarket nearby and bus stop leading to the subway.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 2 Carrer Noruega
description: MODIFICATION: not suitable for motorhomes. Due to the absence of signage throughout the municipality and following a comment, I have reviewed the municipal ordinance and it indicates that motorhomes can only park next to the cultural center and the parking lot next to the town hall. Vans or vehicles approved as residential vehicles are not considered in the ordinance, so they can park here. Beautiful place in the middle of the forest, secluded and quiet. It is reached by a dirt track in good condition from the school road. The place is on the right hand side going down the road. There are other flat spaces to park on the same path a few meters before this location. ATTENTION! Be careful with Google Maps, if you put this location it can take you to another place or by another path. The only viable access is from the school. Mark the school as the destination to arrive correctly. Then take the dirt road going straight. No services but good coverage. Let's keep the place clean for everyone to enjoy.

title: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 28 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
title_short: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 28 Carrer Mossèn Cinto Verdaguer
description: Place in Sant Fost de Campecntellas overlooking the Vallès

title: (08348) Cabrils - 4 Avinguda Zona Esportiva
description: Excellent skatepark, away from the town, with forest very close to the mountain

title: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 1 Carrer Sant Joan
title_short: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 1 Carrer Sant Joan
description: Potable water ! Faucet in the corner of the wall behind the bus panel

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 49 Passeig del Centenari
title_short: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 49 Passeig del Centenari
description: Parking of the cultural center. Easy access, close to shops. According to the municipal ordinance, motorhomes can only park here or in the parking lot next to the town hall.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 51 Passeig del Centenari
title_short: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - 51 Passeig del Centenari
description: Paved parking next to the town hall. Green areas around. Easy access and shops nearby. Motorhomes can only park here or in the parking lot of the cultural center according to the municipal ordinance. Vehicles over 3,500 kg cannot park from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.

title: (08915) Badalona - 1 Carrer de Ferrer Bassa
description: Repsol gas station with filling dispenser for LPG and sale of butane cylinders, also has 24h laundry service and a small shop with bread sale 24 hours every day of the year

title: (08348) Cabrils - 1 Carrer Cal Gras
description: Small parking on two levels flat sand (hard), below the restaurant, in the bend. Without services, accessible to all. Close to homes but very quiet, no passages (out of season). View of the sea in the distance and sunrise

name: Aparcamiento Supermercado Bonpreu
title: (08410) Aparcamiento Supermercado Bonpreu
description: Car park 2 minutes from the A7 exit in Granollers, ideal for refueling and spending the night in a quiet village without crime. Next to the BonPreu supermarket and gas station, which also has Adblue. The supermarket is also open on Sunday morning and in the center of town next to the health center and the Town Hall on Sunday morning there is a vegetable market.

title: (08348) Cabrils - 6 Passeig de Cabrils
description: Next to the gas station. They park motorhomes. At the entrance it is flatter and towards the bottom it is incline. Perfect for visiting the town because it is next door.

title: (08911) Badalona - 6 Carrer de Madoz
description: Optimus hardware store sale of reusable gas camping and disposable butsir cylinders

title: (08348) Cabrils - Unnamed Road
description: Cool spot for transit. Slept there to visit Barcelona. In between, a group of mountain bikers came by, nothing else. --> Tip to visit Barcelona, park in Badalona at the train station and take the train/metro to Barcelona worked great.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 71 Cases de Camp
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 71 Cases de Camp
description: Space for motorhomes and campers on a private property in Vilassar de Mar, without services, with the door open, come in and ask, Jaume/James or Estela will appear at some point or be during the day from 10 a.m. to 8 p.m. in the afternoon. €10 per night. From 8:30 pm to 8:30 am closed for vehicles without prior notice. How to get there: from the side of the sea towards the mountains, NOT from the side of the mountains, (follow the orange triangle, until the hipica) all the way to the right.

title: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 6 Polígon P.I.Can Buscarons de B
title_short: (08170) Montornès del Vallès - 6 Polígon P.I.Can Buscarons de B
description: Large car park, ideal for spending 1 night. not too much noise, no lighting and no one came to see us. Possibility of access to large vehicles.

title: (08917) Badalona - 8 Carrer de la Filosofia
description: Lidl car park. We slept one night and everything was fine. Flat and quiet area. (Tip for those who want to go and see Barcelona later: leave the vehicle at IKEA and move by public transport. Guarded, safe parking near the bus stop. Parking height 2.10 m (ok for VW T6)

title: (08160) Montmeló - 7 Vial Congost
description: Parking for mobile homes in the area immediately to the right of the entrance to the recycling center. Warning: deactivate the pop-up blocker beforehand, otherwise the payment page will be blocked! About 25 minutes from Barcelona, emptying of gray and black water. Large car park, neighborhood playground with basketball and football. With the S/U Bahn you can easily get to Barcelona. Stop p, gracia is centrally located. S/u bahn station montmelo about 10 minutes walk from the square.

title: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 12 Carrer de la Granja de Can Corominas
title_short: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 12 Carrer de la Granja de Can Corominas
description: Quiet location on the outskirts of Barcelona. - Bakeries. - Bars and restaurants. - Lottery sale. - Pharmacy. - Hairdressing. - Stores.

address.street: 12 Carrer de la Granja de Can Corominas

title: (08917) Badalona - 7 Carrer de la Ciència
description: Just a simple car park that is free for day & overnight. We stayed for 3 nights with no problem and was a 15 min walk to Badalona metro station (gets you into Barcelona). Probably only suitable for smaller motor homes or vans and advisable to only park if there are an abundance of spaces (there seemingly usually is) as the residents of the buildings nearby use it

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 1 Carrer Marina
description: A quiet open space where the neighbors park, large, and quite safe, much quieter and safer than those on the beach. It has nothing, not even a container to throw away the garbage.

title: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 6 Passeig de les Corts Catalanes
description: LAUNDRY The value for money in this laundromat is really very good. 2 euros for 20 minutes dryer is really great!?? All (2 washing machines at 10 kg / 1 WM at 12 kg 1 WM at 16 kg / 2 dryers at 18 kg) are paid directly at the machine. It only works with 1 EUR coins. There is a machine on the wall that changes bills. Detergent is included. You cannot add your own detergent. But it smells moderate. Not too strong.

title: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 190 Carrer Barcelona
title_short: (08105) Sant Fost de Campsentelles - 190 Carrer Barcelona
description: Pressure washing center AC wash with walkway height 5m. Washers and dryers. Pet wash 24h. Clean water point. Next to the Lidl.

title: (08410) Vilanova del Vallès - BV-5159
description:
Hello! We are the Pedrón de Sande family (Eli, Alfred and Pau who is 4 and a half years old, also "Suro" a super good and sociable puppy and Lluna a 7 month old border colie puppy).
We live in the middle of cultivated fields and forests. Our life system is slowlife and we would love to receive you on our land.
The location is surrounded by fields and forest. There are no industrial noises and very few cars pass through the area.
The land we offer is flat with short grass, access is super easy.
There is no hot water but you have several outlets outside.
You have available the WiFi of the house with a good connection.
Regarding rules, we want to promote common sense: use electricity conscientiously, garbage collection, collection of
animal droppings, respect the rest of the family that lives in the house.
Always welcome! Greetings.

title: (08160) Montmeló - 8 Polígon Pol17 el Pedregar Indu
title_short: (08160) Montmeló - 8 Polígon Pol17 el Pedregar Indu
description:
We spent one night in the area. There is noise from the road but there is enough space to park.
We were several campers there.

title: (08317) Òrrius - Carretera Cabrils a Òrrius
description: Quiet and flat in the middle of a pine forest. several locations available. Small view through the trees on the city against low. no water point.

title: (08317) Òrrius - 16 Diseminado Veinat de Plaça
description: Place in the middle of nature, just a few bike crossings In the morning. we slept very well.

title: (08917) Badalona - 49 Travessera de Montigalà
description: It is a quiet parking lot next to a very large park where you can relax, take dogs out, take children out to play and walk around the area a bit

title: (08917) Badalona - 20029 Carrer de Luxemburg
description: We have an 8 meter motorhome so it wouldn’t fit in the IKEA/decathlon car parks. But we parked in the road in front of IKEA entrance. Roads around IKEA also had lorries overnight parked. But felt safe leaving motorhome in front of IKEA entrance with security guard. Used toilets and ate in IKEA. 1euro pancakes = Cheap breakfast! Stayed 1 night.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 48 Carrer de Sant Josep
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 48 Carrer de Sant Josep
description: Laundry (the only one for public use in the town).

title: (08317) Òrrius - 26 Carrer Barcelona
description: Free parking next to the small village of Orrius. Quiet and near Barcelona

title: (08317) Òrrius - Camí Sant Bartomeut
description: We were here out of season. During the day there were a lot of cars to park to go to the park.

title: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 4 Cami Font Picant
title_short: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 4 Cami Font Picant
description: Flat parking lot in the forest with enough space for a few vans. A somewhat steep and bumpy driveway but only short and not as bad as others in the area. Spent one night here. It's a chain at the entrance. However, currently open. The road can be heard, but in the distance. We couldn't find a more suitable place nearby, unless there's supposed to be one right next to it.

title: (08912) Badalona - Carrer de Güell i Ferrer, 69
title_short: (08912) Badalona - Carrer de Güell i Ferrer, 69
description: Laundry mat. Washing machine and dryer 17kg / 10kg. They also have free WiFi.

title: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 30 Avinguda dels Rabassaires
title_short: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 30 Avinguda dels Rabassaires
description: Quiet but not isolated area with plenty of parking and safe since it is mc donals, burguer king etc. 10 minutes walk from the center of mollet with all the comforts that this brings and with the possibility of shade, decathlon wiffi

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 14 Carrer de Sant Antoni
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 14 Carrer de Sant Antoni
description: Drinking fountain with plenty of space to stop without disturbing

title: (08349) Cabrils - Carrer Font de Cabrera
description: Level ground parking. Route of ascent to the castle of Burriac. Without services there is a bar nearby. Climbing area nearby.

title: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 203 Avinguda de l'Arquitecte Eduard Ferrés
title_short: (08340) Vilassar de Mar - 203 Avinguda de l'Arquitecte Eduard Ferrés
description: Large earthen car park, relatively flat, next to the swimming pool, shops at 500m, beach at 700m, very good

title: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
title_short: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
description: Campingaz refill bottles (901 and larger) and LPG bottles are sold here.

title: () Valldoriolf -
description:
Are you looking for a safe and quiet place near Barcelona? Here you can spend the night because you don't need much to travel!

IMPORTANT: During this summer, since there are not many shady areas, it is better to avoid being there between 11 in the morning and 8 in the afternoon.

To contact do it only via whatsapp, telegram, signal or email. Not calls. Thank you. Riki.

There is a bus stop (400) 1.5 km away that goes directly to BCN. It takes 30 minutes and costs €4.5/person.

The Montmeló circuit is 3km away. You can walk safely.

title: (08317) Argentona - 22 Carrer Aquença
description: Small car park for about 6 vans on the roadside. Quiet place, I spent the night alone and without any disturbance. From 9 o'clock the cyclists and the odd car start. Little crowded area.

title: (08120) La Llagosta - 29 Carrer del Montseny
description:
24-hour car park
secured by CCTV
I asked the gentleman if I could sleep he said yes.
we are 100m from the train station for Barcelona.
clean and secure no other service

title: (08912) Badalona - 197 Carrer del Progrés
description: Laundry with places to park nearby. possibility of paying in cash or card. Possibility of washing clothes and accessories for pets Open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. There is a bakery/bar next door

name: AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
title: (08349) AREA CAMPER BARCELONA BEACH
description: BARCELONA BEACH CAMPER AREA - New area for motorhomes in Cabrera de Mar, 10 minutes on foot from the train station to Barcelona (trains every 10 minutes, journey time 40 minutes) and 490 meters from the beach and a shopping centre. Located in a privileged environment, it offers all the services: minimarket, cafeteria, picnic area, gray and black water emptying, water filling, washing machine, dryer and hot water shower. Possibility of only changing water for non-customers. Between the sea and the mountains, from the area you can get to Barcelona by bike (60 minutes) along the promenade, next to the beach, and you can practice water sports, hiking, mountain biking and guided visits to archaeological sites.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - BV-5159
description: Parking Canine Aquapark "Perros al agua" There is a large esplanade where you can leave your vehicle to spend a day at the Aquapark. Inside the enclosure there are bathrooms, beach bars, meals (chickens, pizza, salad, pancakes, ice cream...) It is an ideal place to spend the day with children and our 4-legged friends. It is suitable for people with disabilities.

title: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 16 Avinguda del Maresme
title_short: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 16 Avinguda del Maresme
description: Parking allowed because the police also confirmed it. It is not allowed to stay in other parking lots for municipal orders. Quiet at night.

title: (08120) La Llagosta - 30 Carrer de l'Estació
description: Magnificent place for day and night, ideal for visiting Barcelona, train station 50 meters away. Very safe place.

title: (08918) Badalona -
description: Several free places along the boulevard around the tram, passing and lively. advantages: outside the ZBE and on the direct metro to the city center. Possibility to park in the adjacent quieter streets for the night. Garbage cans and shops.

title: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - Carrer de Menorca
title_short: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - Carrer de Menorca
description: Nice little parking lot overlooking Barcelona/Badalona. Next door, little-used one-way street.

title: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
title_short: (08100) Mollet del Vallès - 6 Avinguda de Rivoli
description: Parking only during the day next to the Mollet soccer field. At the entrance there is a sign prohibiting parking from 11pm to 8am. It is located on the outskirts of the town, easy access. Ideal for a stopover or to spend the day. At the end of the parking lot there is a skatepark. There are garbage containers next to the entrance to the parking lot. The car park is surrounded by green areas, ideal for walking the dog. Behind the soccer field there is a pedestrian bridge that crosses the highway and leads to walking paths between the cultivated fields. At the access to the car park there are two concrete blocks that make the passage narrow. Vans fit but be careful.

title: (08110) Moncada y Reixach - C-33
description: Good and quiet place to sleep not far from the city center. It is a very clean and quiet galp gas station at night. Today I have a trailer next to me and a large truck. Very large parking for any size.

title: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 100 Camí del Mig
title_short: (08349) Cabrera de Mar - 100 Camí del Mig
description: Plenty of parking in front of the shops in the commercial area of Cabrera de mar, we parked one night with a 7m long camper. Quiet area, in the distance the music of a disco and a few passing cars.

title: (08130) La Florida - 24 Carrer Nou
description: Small wasteland next to the train tracks. You can park. We have slept in the van.

name: Pàrquing dels Pinetons
title: (08100) Pàrquing dels Pinetons
description: Free parking next to secondary road

title: (08403) Granollers - 49 Carretera Nacional 152
description: Moto gp parking

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 6 Carrer Lleida
description: LA COLADA self-service laundry. Very clean and spacious space, 5 washers and 3 dryers. Seats to sit, table to fold and basket to transport clothes. It has a money exchange machine since the machines work with coins. Trash cans and air conditioning in summer, a very positive point. There is plenty of parking nearby under the freeway with no height limit. Right in front there are garbage containers. In the immediate vicinity there is a fountain, bakeries, supermarkets and parks.

title: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 186 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 186 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: A parking lot at a sports center. It is quite noisy as the freeway is nearby. There is hardly any shade. In the evening young people sit here for a long time. So it's just a little louder. Otherwise we had a quiet night and we were not disturbed in the morning either, despite many cars and an event in the building.

title: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 18 Carrer de Víctor Català
title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 18 Carrer de Víctor Català
description: Parking near the catalunya. Quiet circuit for overnight. It is the parking lot of a soccer field but very wide and empty at night, until 8 o'clock in the morning that people start to come.

title: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 10 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
title_short: (08150) Parets del Vallès - 10 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
description: Self-service laundry and pet wash. Free parking 20 meters behind, enough space to park motorhomes

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 31 Avinguda de Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 31 Avinguda de Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Correcan parking, next to Parc Central, artificial lake with Wake-board, playground, green areas, Condis supermarket, bars and restaurants. Disadvantage: next to the road, but quiet and safe. Parking online. Important to note that dogs can not enter the park, for that is the correcan. Let's keep the place clean

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 79 Carrer Baix de Sant Pere
title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 79 Carrer Baix de Sant Pere
description: Playground for children, with water tap. No waste water disposal possible, it's just to recharge the water.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 10 Carrer Marià Fortuny
title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 10 Carrer Marià Fortuny
description: Parking in residential area, no noise, very quiet and safe.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 3-5 Carrer Marià Fortuny
title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 3-5 Carrer Marià Fortuny

title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 531 Avinguda de la Platja

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 5 Passeig de Can Taió
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 5 Passeig de Can Taió
description: Parking quiet area, bike lane and very cool park, I have slept and nobody has told me, there are several bars nearby, there is also a supermarket in the street behind, it is a quiet residential area, so you have to take care not to dirtying or putting up mess since the neighbors would call the authorities. Relatively close to the AP-7 motorway, a good area to rest before visiting Barcelona. There is a fountain nearby. I emphasize respect for the environment and the neighbors.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: The place is quiet, away from all the main roads but easy to access. Only cyclists pass by here. There are small walks around but I didn't explore much as I was just looking for a quiet night outside of Mataró. Up and down this road are a few setbacks for more RVs.

title: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
title_short: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
description: Parking area next to the road. Not very busy. Quiet to spend a night if it catches you en route.

title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1Z Carrer de Sant Sadurní
description: Open space to park and spend the night without problems with access from the road, spacious and quite quiet place with a small stream next to where you can walk with pets, right in front of a Caprabo supermarket, 250m from restaurants for lunch / dinner.

description: Vallés Park Motorhome Storage Area - occupied by you, or not! Owner speaks a little English and is very helpful.

title: (08030) Barcelona - Carrer de Potosí
description: Large free car park. Very close to public toilets (in the gas station / Carrefour). Close to Metro stop Torres i Bages which goes directly to Arc de Triomf. No place to shower (unless you have one in your van/solar shower). WiFi in the shopping plaza opposite the carpark can be picked up from the spaces closest to the road.

description: Free day parking next to the metro entrance to visit the city

title: (08402) Granollers - 2 Carrer d'Isaac Albéniz
description: Self-service laundry with 5 washers and 4 dryers.  All very clean and spacious. You can pay with coins or bank card at the cashier machine

description: Land parking without services, large parking area

title: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
title_short: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
description: Parking near a metro station. Seems safe during the day.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 3 Carrer de la Pau
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 3 Carrer de la Pau
description: Free roadside parking. It’s not marked as a parking spot but it’s usually full of marked cars on this strip

title: (08302) Mataró - 185 Passeig de Marina
description:
Streets on both sides (in both directions) are called Passeig del Rengle. They are streets with online parking spots. Plenty of space, few cars, and if you park on the side of the trees there is shade.

Right in front there is a viewpoint in which there is also a fountain and a free public bathroom with water and soap to wash hands (or not very large dishes).
There is also a playground beyond and a park for exercises such as bicycles and others, especially for the elderly.

At night it's quiet, during the day some people walk by (not many) and cars pass or park but there aren't many or bother.

title: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
title_short: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
description: D’ara gas station with Lpg

name: Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
title: (08401) Área de Autocaravanas Granollers
description: Motorhome area with 13 parking spaces DO NOT PUT BLACK WATER IN THE DRINKING WATER SUPPLY! It has a different place for that, right next to where organic matter is concerned. Maximum 4 days, bottle area every day. Big freeway next to heavy traffic all day

title: (08401) Granollers - Carrer de Joan Vinyoli, 2
description: Free public parking. 10 min from the center. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby.

title: (08291) Ripollet - 90 Carrer del Padró
description: Parking at the end of town, in front of an open field, possibility of parking on asphalt or ground clearing. Very quiet and lots of light during the day. Streetlight lighting at night. You have the mountain in front, good views and possibility of entering the field that communicates with Montcada-Ripollet and if you walk you arrive at La Llagosta.

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Area de Servicio El Vallés
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Area de Servicio El Vallés
description: A gas station with a shower.

title: (08020) Barcelona - 184 Passeig de la Verneda
description: Parking where you can leave the car during the day and night. There is no surveillance, a lot of sun.

title: (08042) Barcelona - 326 Carretera Alta de les Roquetes
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - 326 Carretera Alta de les Roquetes
description: Sand parking with entry in the bend. Magnificent view of all Barcelona from above, opportunities for walks in the hills. Ideal to be quiet at night during a stay in Barcelona. No water, but there are plenty of fountains in the city. Be careful when traveling in the city, the pound is almost immediate for the French who do not pay the parking meter.

title: (08402) Granollers - 6975 Camí Santa Quitèria
description: Municipal parking

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Gas station with cafeteria/pastries and Burger King. There are toilets (free) 24 hours a day, showers  from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m., garbage containers, an area for emptying gray and black water and a fountain for filling clean water. In total there are about 35 or 40 parking spaces. You can perfectly spend the night.

title: (08302) Mataró - 80 Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: Tree-lined street with shade and many parking spaces, some completely flat. It is located next to the soccer field near the Mossos de Escuadra police station and at the end of the Can Boada polygon. A few meters away we find the Roman site of Torre Llaurader. It is a quiet area with many trees and parks to walk the dog. It is close to the residential area with supermarkets, bars, etc, and about 500m from the beach. At night there is always parking. I don't recommend weekends because they come to have a bottle.

title: (08402) Granollers - 18 Avinguda Sant Esteve
description: Self-service laundry "Lavarapid". They have 6 washers and 3 dryers. Payment by bank card or coins.

title: (08042) Barcelona - 1X Carrer de les Torres
description: Parking near trinitat nova Station that takes you straight into the city centre in roughly 25minutes. Very busy and car spaces are close together. Be cautious of this. I advice arriving in the morning before the masses arrive

title: (08302) Mataró - Passeig de Marina
description: Parking possible along the sidewalks on either side of the street where, alone, the railway line separates us from the sea. Many trains during the day but not at night. Had a quiet night. The police passed last night without stopping.

title: (08302) Mataró - 13 Carrer Joan Larrea
description: Self-service laundry. 3 dryers of 15min. Around there are supermarkets, bank, pharmacy

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 12R Carrer Sector Santa Agnès
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 12R Carrer Sector Santa Agnès
description: Very quiet parking lot in a residential area. There are also a number of parking spaces in the side streets. We spent the night here and felt very safe. Our motorhome of 6m fit into the parking space without any problems.

title: (08186) Barcelona - 11P Barri Can Moncau
description: It is the park of the Lliça D'Amunt shopping center. Leroy Merlin, lidl, Vienna. Night prohibited

title: (08302) Mataró - 129 Avinguda del Maresme
description: Parking during the day, you cannot spend the night. Only 100 meters away there is a sandy beach for people and another small fenced beach for dogs. The first hour is free (2 hours in winter). Until you get there, you pass the train tracks through a 5 meter high tunnel. To walk into the city, you have to take the underground next to the station (beautiful old building in red) under the trains.

title: (08019) Barcelona - 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella
title_short: (08019) Barcelona - 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella
description:
Underground parking accessible to trucks, buses and motorhomes. You might need to book in advance which you can do online (press contact above),  we went in feb and it was quite full. 10 euro taxi to town or 15 min bike ride. Close to a beach with supervised swimming and even a space to bathe with his dog. A large shopping center 100 m. A tram line and many buses day and night to access the city center. Only downside, it is hot in the parking lot to sleep at night but it is better than having a window break on the free parking. Plan to book on the website of municipal services in Barcelona to pay less.
Be aware of length restrictions: on website is written 7 meter, in email they write 6 meter.

address.street: 560 Passeig Marítim de la Mar Bella

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1E Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1E Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
description: Parking for AC in La Roca Village shopping center. Parking during business hours.

title: (08291) Ripollet - 16 Avinguda del Mediterrani
description: Large esplanade of land. It has no service. Very little shade. Quiet area where once a truck parks. In front there is a large park to walk around with drinking fountains and benches to sit on. A place to spend a night if necessary or make a stopover. The green area is huge for walking with the dogs. In the park there is a barbecue area and a bar for refreshments. You can't go on the last weekend of August because they hold the town's biggest festival and close the area and prohibit driving through the streets near the car park.

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Av. de Canaletes
title_short: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Av. de Canaletes
description: Space with a few tables to eat 2 minutes walk from the road. Peaceful place. From Friday to Monday you can park on the nearest avenue.

title: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
description:
Here we found 3 parkings. Better to use the 1. Quite flat and asphalted. A lot of car movement! A neighbor parks his car years ago and told me there are no problems. The entrance is easy. The Canyelles L3 metro is 10 minutes away.
Recall that motorhomes are prohibited in Barcelona
No shade, no services

title: (08019) Barcelona - 85 Passeig de Garcia Fària
description: Green parking space. from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. it is chargeable and 2 hours maximum, after 8 p.m. it is free. A safe place in what is Barcelona. Noisy in the morning since it is the entrance to the B10 motorway

title: (08027) Barcelona - 11 Baixada de la Sagrera
description: Parking in the neighborhood of Sagrera, shops and public transport nearby, during the day has a lot of activity the night is quieter, ideal to visit Barcelona

title: (08019) Barcelona - 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar
title_short: (08019) Barcelona - 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar
description: Simple but effective underground parking. Allow to park easily. Not very glamorous but in view of other parking (free and paid) that are not secure, those in the underground are better. However nobody in the office while everything is on. Allow 20/25 minutes by bike to see the nearest monuments.

address.street: 1 Carrer de la Selva de Mar

title: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
title_short: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
description: Ascent to a parking lot with exceptional views of the city of Mataró and the port, suitable for all vehicles. Maximum length 8m. About 20 places to park. There are rubbish bins, tables and some route through the area.

address.street: 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa

title: (08130) Santiga - Unnamed Road
description:
Lovely parking lot surrounded by trees and shade. Perfect to spend a night if you pass through here.
Quiet place next to a church.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 6F Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 6F Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
description: Parking at the Roca Village shopping center. There are several car parks, some are open during the night.

title: (08304) Mataró - 17 Carrer Riu Ebre
description: Parking under the viewpoint of the Mataró forest park. The viewpoint has better views but it is very crowded and this parking lot is much quieter and has 2 levels. no parking from 10pm to 7am. Then in the morning you can go up to see the viewpoint and there are tables for breakfast with good views.

title: (08186) Lliçà d'Amunt - 2 Carretera Granollers
description: City center car park with nearby restaurant and trade. no barrier Ok for big guys. at the end of the car park small path at the end of a quiet corner ....

title: (08401) Granollers - 37 Carrer Ripollès
description: Area next to the Lledoner park, quiet and ideal for a stop on the road, picnic area, pee can, and playground. Without services

title: (08302) Mataró - 100 Passeig del Callao
description: Drinking water fountain 5m from the car park between the road and Mataró beach. Perfect for filling jerry cans. Easy access for a van or a motorhome if there is room.

title: (08521) Bellavista - 92 Carrer Orient
description: It is a parking lot, it is not controlled but it is very quiet and we spent the night and nobody said anything to us and nobody bothered us. It is in the same town there are neighbors next to it and it looks like a safe place

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - Passatge Sagrera
description: Baricentro Shopping Center Parking to park during the day and buy and spend the night in peace. Place to sleep peacefully and vigilantly hanging around. Pharmacy has 24 hours and Mc Donalds 24 hotas on Fridays and Saturdays. There is no height limit next to Mc Donalds.

title: (08301) Mataró - Av. del Maresme
description: Parking along the railway line opposite the nautical center, possibility of spending the night without problem, no prohibition sign. On the other hand noisy by the passage of the trains. Access to the beach at 50m. Nice city to stay there for 1 day.

title: (08041) Barcelona - 114 Carrer de Trinxant
description: Secure car park. You can find them on google maps by Motorhome parking in Barcelona. When we arrived at the gates, the security guard showed us our parking space and gave us a ticket. We visited the city (8 min walk to Navas metro station) and returned in 6 hours. Worth it as all the parking and guards make you feel safe for your van/RV. 2.9m height max.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 69 Carrer de Marià Aguiló
description: Automatic laundry Sale of detergent 0.50 euros.

title: (08319) Dosrius - 9 B-510
description: Public parking next to the village. Very calm. Supermarket 2 min.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 44 Plaça del Cementiri d'Horta
description: Cemetery parking, very quiet and safe, during the day it is busy having the funeral home next door.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 231 Carrer dels Almogàvers
description:
Automatic laundry "La Wash"
Detergent and softener included in the wash
Washing 4'5 euros
Dried 2 euros

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - 91 Passeig de Cordelles
title_short: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - 91 Passeig de Cordelles
description: Place traveled day / night. Recommended for overnight on the road. Shopping center nearby. Drinking water source in the park less than 100m.

title: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 15 Carrer del Doctor Fleming
title_short: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 15 Carrer del Doctor Fleming
description: Land area in industrial estate. If you are in the area, the only thing I have found to be able to stop with some shade. Only stop to eat.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 117 Carretera Horta a Cerdanyola
description: Orchard viewpoint. Something closer than the following and in my opinion with better views. In Covidien times at 10pm there was no one but when I arrived I found several cars with youth partying.

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - Carrer Verneda
description: It is an area of orchards that is crossed by a river, there is a small picnic area and at night there is a good area for animals to spend the night. Sometimes they make a bottle. Free

title: (08005) Barcelona - 16.B Passatge d'Aymà
description: LLACUNA CAR PARKING. Parking for hours/days. It closes at 9:00 p.m. but you can leave the van parked overnight, it's a good car park, high ceilings, ideal for motorhomes and tall vans. The area is ideal for exploring Barcelona and leaving the van safe.

name: AREA DE PERNOCTA  - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
title: (08520) AREA DE PERNOCTA - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
title_short: (08520) AREA DE PERNOCTA  - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
description:
ATTENTION: Closed for renovations as of may 7, 2023
Very well connected area, easily accessible with comfortable and spacious pitches. Cleaning area, emptying gray water and chemical toilet, charging drinking water and electricity. Maximum stay 24 hours. 20 seats. € 10 night. Attention during office hours: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM / 4:00 PM at 8:30 PM. Bus stop at 500m. Mechanical motorhome workshop at 500m. Restaurants, cinemas and shops within 3 km In this area are allowed: motorhomes, motorhomes and prepared vans.
WhatsApp reservations

address.street: Ctra. C-251  Km 3,5 (rotonda, rond point, roundabout)

title: (08304) Mataró - 72 Carrer dels Remences
description: It is a car park in the Valverich industrial estate, but it does not have a gauge. it has good views. there is no limitation for AC.. it is very close to the c32 highway. easy access. away from the city center

title_short: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
description: Known as Montbau viewpoint, it is an area to rest with plenty of tables and good views of Barcelona. There is no water (as far as I know). It is accessed from the road easily visible. Plenty of room to park and easy to maneuver. The parking there is a bit of shade

address.street: Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)

title: (08041) Barcelona - 71X Carrer del Mas Casanovas
description: Paid parking.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 10I Vial Camino

title_short: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 92 Passeig del Doctor Moragas

title_short: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 9 Carrer de Monturiol

title: (08035) Barcelona - 8 Carrer Juan de Ávila
description: Free parking with views of Barcelona

title: (08005) Barcelona - 100 Carrer del Doctor Trueta
description: Secure street parking without services. Near everything...

title: (08018) Barcelona - 118 Carrer de Pamplona
description: Fuente con agua. Fácil parar.

title: (08024) Barcelona - 77 Carrer de Josep Serrano
description: Quiet and asphalt parking

title: (08420) Canovelles - 1L Carrer Indústria
description: It is a very fast and efficient service. I arrived full of mosquitoes and dirt and in the end it was like new. And they gave me a soft drink and a coffee!!! It's a great service BUT it's best to call first and make an appointment because otherwise you might be waiting a while behind a long line of trucks.

title: (08018) Barcelona - 101 Carrer de Pamplona
description: Great place to Ad water in your van !

title: (08290) -
description: Can Coll picnic area and barbecues (you have to pay at the bar to use the barbecue) pets are not allowed, it is in the Collserola park, next to the road that will take us directly to Barcelona 15 min

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - s/n Camí Antic de Vic
title_short: (08520) Corró d'Avall - s/n Camí Antic de Vic
description: Parking places asphalted at the top with fountain and tree area in the shade. (The Police does not allow sleeping)

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - BV-1415
description: Parking without picnic area, beginning of routes. Quiet zone.

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking with easy access both with tourism, van, caravan or 4x4! Sito very quiet until 7: 30-8: 00 in the morning! Fit about 6-7 large vehicles!

title: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 42 Carrer de Manresa
title_short: (08184) Palau-solità i Plegamans - 42 Carrer de Manresa
description: Parking area in an undeveloped residential area. There are several streets where you can park without any buildings around. There are some fields, nature and nearby some houses. A quiet place to spend the night on the outskirts of town. Pay attention to the street where you park. Most are fortnightly parking, so depending on the day of the month you park on one side or the other of the street.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 146 Avinguda d'Icària
description: Blue zone, Max 2 hours of parking during the day, from 8 pm as long as you want. Located on a busy street with many shops and passage, you will not be mugged here.

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall
title_short: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall
description: Small plain at the entrance to the cemetery. The council bans air conditioning throughout the city and all its neighborhoods.

title: (08005) Barcelona - 5 Moll de Xaloc
description: Olympic Port car park. Accessible by motorhome. Paid.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 172.B Carrer de Casp
description: Water point accessible right on the corner from the street, 100m from Basic-Fit..

title: (08203) Sabadell - 190 Camí Can Quadres
description: Sabadell covered track, parking area, quiet with municipal swimming pool, fountain.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
description: Free paved parking

title: (08440) Barcelona - 61 Carrer Orfeó Català
description: On the outskirts of Cardedeu, there is always a place to park, it feels safe, Mercadona close by

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 150 Carrer la Tecnologia
title_short: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 150 Carrer la Tecnologia
description:
Perfect level parking to be with the camper, it is very empty, it is quite large, approximately 20 spaces, it is a very quiet or brown polygon, if you go by the AP-7 (highway) and you want to rest better here rather than in a service area, much quieter and you only deviate 5 minutes from the highway, it also has good lighting

There is no height limit

There are large spaces for trucks or buses in case you go with a large motorhome

Mercadona less than 5min and laundry less than 7

title: (08013) Barcelona - 174 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Paid parking convenient for visiting Barcelona safely. there are guards around the clock. there are toilets at the back of the garage (we asked and we were able to use them). for the height I don't know but in a van it's ok !! I would say 2m30 max.

title: (08023) Barcelona - 7B Carrer del Portell
description: Small parking lot very quiet at night, close to a gym for the neighborhood. right next to park guell. Sloping entrance difficult access, only suitable for vans.

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès -
description: Free parking near the train station. Calm on a Sunday night.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 183 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Amazing bar accompanied with a proper laundry service. The washing and drying works with tokens so you don’t have to bother with coins which is a huge extra.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
description: Free parking on gravel field. Right next to a soccer field. Approximately 30 min walk to Park Güell. Metro station nearby. Easy access to the city. No service, only parking.
